rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0001
rows.name:
So, you know how there are
sparkly spots when you're
walking around outside?

rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0002
rows.name: That's where my favorite bugs are!

rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Though, sometimes you can
catch fish or pick vegetables
from them, too...

rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, and! They say if you have a
knowledgeable Blade with you, you
can get way more than usual.

rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0005
rows.name: I bet they teach you the knack for it.

rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0006
rows.name:
I wanna team up with a Blade
that's studied entomology
and go bug collecting!
